tags: can yall tell how hard i am down in denial rn
summary:
Broke: Tony Stark dying like he did in Endgame
Woke: Tony Stark using the Stark Gauntlet as he did, the superior (human-built!)...
body:
Broke: Tony Stark dying like he did in Endgame

Woke: Tony Stark using the Stark Gauntlet as he did, the superior (human-built!) tech that wields all six infinity stones managing to protect his body, but not his arm. Tony Stark losing his right arm when snapping off Thanos. Tony Stark looking at the now empty place, shocked, but at least alive. The Avengers gathering around him, panicked. Rhodey and Pep shaking him softly, only for him to look at them and mutter “damn, there goes the good arm”. Tony Stark going back to his (found) family, to his now way smaller workshop, building himself a prosthesis. Tony Stark, aka the embodiment of Wanting To Help, playfully adapting a DUM-E claw and goofing around with Morgan and the bots when it hits him how many people don’t even have a proper replacement, let alone a robotic one. Tony Stark, now amputee with the sickest fake arm on this planet, ditching the Avengers and DIVING into building artificial limbs. Tony Stark, finally happy and living up to the promise he gave Yinsen in that cave once, visiting all the children’s hospitals he’s donating Stark Limbs to with his superfamily, smile growing wider as more and more of the kids refer to him as Mr. Stark instead of Iron Man. Tony Stark finally being the hero he always hid behind the iron armour.

reblog.comment:

Tony Stark finally being the hero he always hid behind the iron armour.

Rhodey and Pep shaking him softly, only for him to look at them and mutter “damn, there goes the good arm”. summary: I guess it's just anuther one of those days where I'm missing everything
title: I guess it's just anuther one of those days where I'm missing everything
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IGGUOj

by bookworm_shipper

Bucky Barnes meets and falls in love with Steve Rogers. Three years later, there is a completely new cast of characters in town, and Tony Stark is front and center. Torn between his relationship with Steve, and his growing love for Stephen Strange, will his life ever not be tragic?

Words: 2321, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Rating: General Audiences

  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - High School, Fluff and Angst, Tooth-Rotting Fluff, Angst with a Happy Ending, BAMF Natasha Romanov, endgame ironstrange and stucky, Tony and Pepper is minor
